metadata.title: CVE-2022-30688 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description:
needrestart 0.8 through 3.5 before 3.6 is prone to local privilege escalation. Regexes to detect the Perl, Python, and Ruby interpreters are not anchored, allowing a local user to escalate privileges when needrestart tries to detect if interpreters are using old source files.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2022-30688` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

needrestart - 3.5-4ubuntu2.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: needrestart package in impish was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '3.5-4ubuntu2.1').
